channel.title: [PI] Adding custom crowns
channel.description: I recently tried to add in custom crowns because i really don't like the old crowns. So i went in my client then sprites then i couldnt find where the modicons were like they just werent there. but in game they show up fine... i have no clue what to do. Would be really help ful if someone could tv me or send me a snippet. thanks =]

item.title: [PI] Adding custom crowns
item.dc:creator: @nicke924 nicke924
item.description:
@nicke924 wrote:

Use Tom’s Cache Editor then open your cache in it and you should see ModIcons.

Read full topic
